description: The changes for bug 723398 forgot that FlatDHCPNetwork inherited from FlatNetwork, and it is therefore broken.
title: Fixes for bug 723298 inadvertently broke flatdhcp

comments.content: The changes for bug 723398 forgot that FlatDHCPNetwork inherited from FlatNetwork, and it is therefore broken.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda

comments.content:
My apologies Vish. 
I tested the bug fix only with Flat and Vlan manager. 
A reminder for me for future fixes, and a point for adding integration testing into Hudson!
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~salvatore-orlando

comments.content:
On Thu, Feb 24, 2011 at 4:58 AM, Salvatore Orlando
<email address hidden> wrote:
> ... a point for adding integration testing into Hudson!

Yet another reason that integration/smoketests need to be the #1
priority right now, IMHO.

-jay
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jaypipes

comments.content:
No worries.  I suggested the fix after all. And I approved it, so i think most of the fault belongs to me.

Vish
